snippet: The Yankees are giving away bobbleheads at games for the first time in 10 years, and they are beginning with figurines of Derek Jeter, who is set to rejoin the team soon.
abstract: New York Yankees are giving away bobbleheads at games for first time in 10 years, beginning with figurines of Derek Jeter in anticipation of his return from injury rehabilitation.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are giving away bobbleheads at games for the first time in 10 years, and they are beginning with figurines of Derek Jeter, who is set to rejoin the team soon.

headline.main: Bobblehead Giveaway to Precede Jeter’s Return to Yankees
headline.print_headline: Bobblehead Giveaway To Precede Jeter Return
